constraints.intension: imp(MCS_Processor1, and(le(1, add( MCS_Processor1_Memory1 , MCS_Processor1_Memory2 )), ge(2, add( MCS_Processor1_Memory1 , MCS_Processor1_Memory2 ))))
imp(MCS_Processor2, and(le(1, add( MCS_Processor2_Memory1 , MCS_Processor2_Memory2 )), ge(2, add( MCS_Processor2_Memory1 , MCS_Processor2_Memory2 ))))
eq(Memory_card, add(add( MCS_Processor1_Memory1 , MCS_Processor1_Memory2 ) ,add( MCS_Processor2_Memory1 , MCS_Processor2_Memory2 ) ))
le(1, add(add( MCS_Processor1_Memory1 , MCS_Processor1_Memory2 ) ,add( MCS_Processor2_Memory1 , MCS_Processor2_Memory2 ) ))
ge(4, add(add( MCS_Processor1_Memory1 , MCS_Processor1_Memory2 ) ,add( MCS_Processor2_Memory1 , MCS_Processor2_Memory2 ) ))
